attributes.action: Prescribe Antifa as a terrorist organisation.
attributes.additional_details:
Parliamentary and council candidates are being targeted and democracy is under threat from these people.

This group uses platforms that include Facebook and Twitter to organise violent protests.

Democracy needs to be defended from this group.
attributes.background:
Antifa are a group that oppose free speech and label all views different to their own as racist.

Antifa members attend rallies dressed in black and have their faces covered.
